query: When was my last Hep B vaccination administered?
resource_summaries:
This is a record of a completed Hepatitis B adult immunization administered on August 28, 2019, to a patient during an encounter at PCP167180.
This record is about a completed Hepatitis B adult immunization administered on August 22, 2018, in a primary care setting.
answer: Your last Hep B vaccination was administered on August 28, 2019.
